mapper.sql: bid, pwd, bimage,locname, address, cox, coy, bname, realname, idcard, mobile, bank, bankname, bankcode, saletime, type, cardimg, saleimg, businessimg, salecard, money, creattime, logintime, ip, state
mapper.select: select bid, bimage, locname, address, cox, coy, bname, realname, idcard, mobile, bank, bankname, bankcode, saletime, type, cardimg, saleimg, businessimg, salecard, money, creattime, logintime, ip, state, (POWER(MOD(ABS(cox-#{cox,jdbcType=REAL}),360),2) + POWER(ABS(coy-#{coy,jdbcType=REAL}),2)) AS distance from dd_business order by distance

select bid, bimage, locname, address, cox, coy, bname, realname, idcard, mobile, bank, bankname, bankcode, saletime, type, cardimg, saleimg, businessimg, salecard, money, creattime, logintime, ip, state from dd_business

mapper.update:
update dd_business
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=CHAR},
bimage = #{bimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
locname = #{locname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cox = #{cox,jdbcType=REAL},
coy = #{coy,jdbcType=REAL},
bname = #{bname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=CHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR},
bank = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bankname = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bankcode = #{bankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
saletime = #{saletime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
cardimg = #{cardimg,jdbcType=CHAR},
saleimg = #{saleimg,jdbcType=CHAR},

logintime = #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=CHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where bid = #{bid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
